title: [Discussion] Meanwhile the PAWS club continues to feed strays. Please take those dogs home if u like them so much.

comments.body: Okay now what has this news to do with PAWS club? Afaik the dogs in PESU are being fed regularly and vaccinated. They have been friendly with the students on campus.
As far as I have seen on the campus they were always chill, except for that bow bow at night beside hostel...
Sounds like you're retarded. The dogs on campus are friendly and aren't aggressive. You sound like a lame hater with your comments, please take them somewhere else. Thank you.
